lead_paragraph: SMITH--Jeri. Congregation Shaaray Tefila records with deep sorrow the death of our longtime cherished member. Heartfelt condolences are extended to her daughters, Marla, Andrea and Pamela. May God comfort their loved ones and may Jeri's memory be for blessing. Rabbi Deborah A. Hirsch Michael Starr, President 1/3
